cost_protocol.usage: Cost operation will be performed for this IGP

cost_threshold_percent.description: Traffic utilization threshold percentage (in decimal format) to check cost process. For example 0.7 means 70%
cost_threshold_percent.usage: If the parameter is set to 0.7, cost out operation is considered successful if the traffic falls to less than 70% of the previous traffic on the specified interfaces that is part of the IGP. Similarly, cost in is considered successful if traffic grows to more than 70% of the previous traffic for specified interfaces which are part of IGP.

if_names.description: List of interfaces on which cost operation is to performed
if_names.usage: Interfaces specified using this parameter will be costed out followed by costed in

provider.description: Provider to be used to connect to the router

collection_type.description: Collection type to be used for data collection

mop_timeout.description: Timeout duration for MoP i.e. maximum time spent in Running/Paused states. e.g. 900s, 10m, 1.5h, etc. Valid time units are 'ns', 'us' (or 'Âµs'), 'ms', 's', 'm', 'h'.
